text.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 30px; font-weight: 800; fill: #222222; letter-spacing: 0.2px;
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: #222222;
text.tspan: {{DESCRIPTION_LINE1:Save up to 85% on your electric bill with Sunco Lighting long-lasting}}
{{DESCRIPTION_LINE2:lamp life 25,000 hour LEDs. Low power usage replacement for}}

text.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 800; fill: #222222;
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; fill: #222222;

font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 9.5px; fill: #222222;
text.tspan: {{NOTE_TEXT:The curves indicate the illuminated area and the average illumination at different distances.}}
